title: Some splash art legality questions
body:
Heya guys!
I've been thinking about printing out the splash art of a champion and hanging it up as a poster but wasn't sure if that was exactly legal. I've looked into it and it's all by interpretation from the terms of service so I was just wondering if someone would be able to give a straight forward answer to whether or not I'll get in trouble for hanging up some splash art on my wall. No redistribution and no claiming it was my work. Any help would be appreciated!

replies.body: Well... as far as i remember, the "Legal Jibber Jabber" (its literally called like that) says that its okay as long as you dont use their official logos or sell the thing.

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=2tws9JXE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-08-25T02:39:01.361+0000)
>
> Well... as far as i remember, the "Legal Jibber Jabber" (its literally called like that) says that its okay as long as you dont use their official logos or sell the thing.

Ebonmaw remembered the name right :D

https://www.riotgames.com/en/legal
You're not making money off it or claiming it so I'd think it would be entirely legal, but I'll let a Rioter give official word.
It's fine.  It's a poster for your wall and Riot is not going to send hired goons to your house to check.  They aren't Take-Two Interactive.
